title: Won't even trust a PB&J sandwich: Boeing under fire amid Starliner woes
content: As Indian-American astronaut Sunita Williams and her colleague astronaut Butch Wilmore are stuck at the International Space Station owing to multiple technical issues in Starliner, embattled Boeing has again come under fire as its two 737 Max crashes have not rightfully slipped into oblivion. After causing deaths of 5779 on Earth, Boeing sent the two astronauts to Space despite knowing the flaws of Starliner.
summary: As Indian-American astronaut Sunita Williams and her colleague astronaut Butch Wilmore are stuck at the International Space Station owing to multiple technical issues in Starliner, embattled Boeing has again come under fire as its two 737 Max crashes have not rightfully slipped into oblivion. After causing deaths of 5779 on Earth, Boeing sent the two astronauts to Space despite knowing the flaws of Starliner.

Watch: In Biden camp's new ad, 'Trump is only out for himself'
content: ​Joe Biden's campaign released a new ad Tuesday hitting out at Donald Trump for thinking only for himself while Joe Biden is a champion of the middle class. In the 30-second ad, which will air in the battleground states of Georgia and Pennsylvania, a narrator says, "Donald Trump loves to attack Joe Biden because he's focused on revenge and he has no plan to help the middle class. He'd just give more tax cuts to the wealthy."
summary: ​Joe Biden's campaign released a new ad Tuesday hitting out at Donald Trump for thinking only for himself while Joe Biden is a champion of the middle class. In the 30-second ad, which will air in the battleground states of Georgia and Pennsylvania, a narrator says, "Donald Trump loves to attack Joe Biden because he's focused on revenge and he has no plan to help the middle class. He'd just give more tax cuts to the wealthy."

title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle can't go this country during world tour
content: Harry and Meghan's Nigeria trip rattled King Charles as he saw it "as an attempt to undermine the monarchy in the Commonwealth". The royal family was concerned that the couple had gone rogue. "For Charles and William, it’s as if Meghan and Harry are saying, ‘We don’t need your permission to be working royals — we will do it on our own terms whenever and wherever we like,’" Royal expert Tom Quinn earlier said.
summary: Harry and Meghan's Nigeria trip rattled King Charles as he saw it "as an attempt to undermine the monarchy in the Commonwealth". The royal family was concerned that the couple had gone rogue. "For Charles and William, it’s as if Meghan and Harry are saying, ‘We don’t need your permission to be working royals — we will do it on our own terms whenever and wherever we like,’" Royal expert Tom Quinn earlier said.

title: Melania Trump won't move back to White House if Trump wins because...
content: ​Trump's youngest son Barron Trump could be going to college at New York University explaining why his mother would love to spend her time in NY, and at Florida where they have their resort in Palm Beach. If Melania chooses to be a part-time First Lady, this will be a first. ​“Melania does what Melania wants,” said Mary Jordan, a Washington Post associate editor and the author of the book “The Art of Her Deal: The Untold Story of Melania Trump.”
summary: ​Trump's youngest son Barron Trump could be going to college at New York University explaining why his mother would love to spend her time in NY, and at Florida where they have their resort in Palm Beach. If Melania chooses to be a part-time First Lady, this will be a first. ​“Melania does what Melania wants,” said Mary Jordan, a Washington Post associate editor and the author of the book “The Art of Her Deal: The Untold Story of Melania Trump.”

title: Israel court ends draft exemptions for ultra-Orthodox Jews
Team combs fire-ravaged New Mexico community for remains of the missing
content: Residents of Ruidoso, New Mexico, return to a fire-ravaged village as search teams look for 29 missing people after devastating wildfires. The fires, which killed at least two and destroyed over 1,500 structures, prompted massive evacuations. Efforts are underway to restore utilities and provide aid, with a disaster declaration facilitating recovery.
summary: Residents of Ruidoso, New Mexico, return to a fire-ravaged village as search teams look for 29 missing people after devastating wildfires. The fires, which killed at least two and destroyed over 1,500 structures, prompted massive evacuations. Efforts are underway to restore utilities and provide aid, with a disaster declaration facilitating recovery.

title: Philippines seeking US clarification on anti-vax propaganda operation
content: During the Senate committee hearing, Health Undersecretary Rosario Vergeire highlighted the challenges of combating organized vaccine disinformation. The Philippines continues to seek clarification from the US defense department regarding the clandestine propaganda campaign against Chinese vaccines. The death toll and infection rates underscore the severe impact of the COVID-19 pandemic in the country.
summary: During the Senate committee hearing, Health Undersecretary Rosario Vergeire highlighted the challenges of combating organized vaccine disinformation. The Philippines continues to seek clarification from the US defense department regarding the clandestine propaganda campaign against Chinese vaccines. The death toll and infection rates underscore the severe impact of the COVID-19 pandemic in the country.

US top secret submarine prototype weapon spotted on Google maps
content: The US Navy's strategic responses to Russia and China's underwater drone technology include the development of the Manta Ray prototype. This uncrewed underwater vehicle, built by Northrop Grumman, underwent successful testing off the California coast. The focus on drone technology reflects an evolving arms race in underwater military capabilities worldwide.
summary: The US Navy's strategic responses to Russia and China's underwater drone technology include the development of the Manta Ray prototype. This uncrewed underwater vehicle, built by Northrop Grumman, underwent successful testing off the California coast. The focus on drone technology reflects an evolving arms race in underwater military capabilities worldwide.

title: Korean Air probes pressure problem on diverted Boeing jet

title: Investigators comb wreckage after Seoul lithium battery fire kills 23
content: Following the tragic factory blaze, investigations continue as authorities emphasize safety measures and fire prevention. Visits from officials underscore the importance of addressing challenges with lithium fire safety.

title: Pashtun Tahafuz Movement holds massive rally to protest military operations in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
content: Thousands rallied from Sultan Khel Market to Landi Kotal Bazaar, led by the Pashtun Tahafuz Movement, to protest against military operations and human rights abuses in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. The demonstration highlighted rising discontent among Pashtuns and demands for peace and justice.
summary: Thousands rallied from Sultan Khel Market to Landi Kotal Bazaar, led by the Pashtun Tahafuz Movement, to protest against military operations and human rights abuses in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa. The demonstration highlighted rising discontent among Pashtuns and demands for peace and justice.

title: New $25,000 IGF Archer-Amish Award for Literature to celebrate Indian storytelling
content: Bestselling authors Jeffrey Archer and Amish Tripathi have launched a $25,000 literary award with the India Global Forum to celebrate and nurture contemporary Indian fiction, aiming to elevate storytelling that significantly contributes to the narrative of modern India.
summary: Bestselling authors Jeffrey Archer and Amish Tripathi have launched a $25,000 literary award with the India Global Forum to celebrate and nurture contemporary Indian fiction, aiming to elevate storytelling that significantly contributes to the narrative of modern India.

title: Nepalese spiritual leader 'Buddha Boy' convicted of sexual assault on minor
content: Ram Bahadur Bamjan, aka 'Buddha Boy' was found guilty in Nepal of sexually assaulting a minor. Once known for his motionless meditation, his fall from grace includes allegations of misconduct, casting a shadow over his spiritual claims.
summary: Ram Bahadur Bamjan, aka 'Buddha Boy' was found guilty in Nepal of sexually assaulting a minor. Once known for his motionless meditation, his fall from grace includes allegations of misconduct, casting a shadow over his spiritual claims.

title: US ambassador visits conflict-ridden Mexican state to expedite avocado inspections
content: Criminal groups in Michoacan engage in avocado smuggling, undermining US inspections. The region's avocado growers face threats from drug gangs, highlighting the risks associated with avocado production in Mexico.
summary: Criminal groups in Michoacan engage in avocado smuggling, undermining US inspections. The region's avocado growers face threats from drug gangs, highlighting the risks associated with avocado production in Mexico.
